text: tara ca'ite atyacari ke, ye allahara paksa theke tara kache pramanita saksyake gopana kare? Allaha tomadera karma samparke bekhabara nana. Se sampradaya atita haye geche. Tara ya kareche, ta tadera jan'ye ebam tomara ya karacha, ta tomadera jan'ye. Tadera karma samparke tomadera jijnesa kara habe na.
